name: Moonfront Hotel Demo
description:
Moonfront Hotel Demo

Moonfront Hotel is a narrative-based puzzle game.

You will be in charge of concierge work as a trainee at this hotel.

Find out and fulfill the wishes of animals who arrive at the hotel with lost memories.

How to play

Moonfront Hotel is a puzzle game in which you find the correct pairs.

Pay attention to the interactions that occur when you pair things correctly. 

Each pair has its own story.

Key features
  • A short, story-driven puzzle adventure
  • Soundtrack composed of lyrical melodies
  • Short animations that occur when you have correct pairs
  • Finding memories by completing pairs
